name: Boston Startup School
overview:
Boston Startup School is the best place for young professionals to learn the skills needed to have an immediate and positive impact on the startup they join.

Your days will be spent working on real startup challenges, rapidly applying your new skills. Our program is an immersive, six-week, full time experience that educates participants on startup culture, team dynamics and one of four in-demand skill sets. You will have an opportunity to work with an incredible set of fellow students and meet Boston startup companies that are looking for top talent to grow their businesses.
